<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3186</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Wind power station</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wickeln Sie Kraftwerk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enroulez la centrale électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enrole a estação de potência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centrale elettrica del vento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σταθμός παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enrolle la central eléctrica</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">How can we produce electrical energy from the wind? Explore the wind power station.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wind mill</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie können wir elektrische Energie aus dem Wind 
produzieren? Erforschen Sie das Windkraftwerk.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment pouvons-nous produire l'énergie 
électrique à partir du vent ? Explorez la centrale électrique
de vent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como podemos nós produzir a energia elétrica do
vento? Explore a estação de potência do vento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come possiamo produrre l'energia elettrica 
proveniente dal vento? Esplori la centrale elettrica del vento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς μπορούμε να παραγάγουμε την ηλεκτρική ενέργεια 
από τον αέρα; Εξερευνήστε το σταθμό παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού 
ρεύματος αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo podemos producir energía eléctrica del 
viento? Explore la central eléctrica del viento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wickeln Sie Tausendstel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enroulez le moulin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enrole o moinho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">avvolga il laminatoio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανεμόμυλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enrolle el molino</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
